name: Lamborghini Parking 3
description:
Lamborghini Parking 3

Park your luxury car to the designated position, which requires superb control. Do you dare to challenge?

Description

This is a game that requires you to have a lot of control. You need to use the keyboard or virtual joystick to park your luxury car to the designated location. Luxury cars you can not afford to hurt, just a little bump will pay the price of heartache, good luck.

How to Play

You need to use the keyboard or virtual joystick to park your luxury car to the designated location.
